name: PaintFactory
description:
This game is about a color's interaction. Change tower color, paint square and achive the level's goal. There is ingame help for details.

Use WASD to walk, 1-6 or mouse to select color, E to change nearest tower color and SPACE to use your super ability - whitening all around!

Game was made from scratch for gamejam, so no sound effects and maybe some bugs - sorry for that

Programming - DarkPenguin
Art & game design - Katarina_Nya

Music:
"Industrious Ferret" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
